mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_TYPE_NO, BOARDT_NAME, BOARDT_TYPE, BOARDT_READ, BOARDT_WRITE, BOARDT_CONTENT, BOARDT_USE, OFFICE_USE, D.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE, BT.EMP_NO, BT.CREATE_DATE, BT.MODIFIER, BT.MODIFY_DATE, BT.USE_YN FROM tbl_boardtype BT LEFT join tbl_department d ON D.DEPT_CODE = BT.DEPT_CODE WHERE BT.USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_BOARDTYPE ( BOARD_TYPE_NO , BOARDT_NAME , BOARDT_TYPE , BOARDT_READ , BOARDT_WRITE , BOARDT_CONTENT , BOARDT_USE , OFFICE_USE , DEPT_CODE , EMP_NO , CREATE_DATE , MODIFIER , MODIFY_DATE , USE_YN ) VALUES ( BOARD_TYPE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL , '일반게시판' , 'S' , 5 , 5 , 5 , 'N' , NULL , #{userData} , NULL , SYSDATE , #{userData} , SYSDATE , 'Y' )
mapper.delete: update TBL_BOARDTYPE set USE_YN = 'N' where BOARD_TYPE_NO = #{boardTypeNo}
